document.full_text: imf chief dominique strauss-kahn appeared in court on monday for the first time since he was accused of trying to rape a hotel maid in a case that sent shockwaves through french politics and left the imf in turmoil.
document.title: strauss-kahn appears in ny court in sex assault case
lines_and_colors: imf chief dominique strauss-kahn appeared in court on monday for the first time since he was accused of trying to rape a hotel maid in a case that sent shockwaves through french politics and left the imf in turmoil.
